NewsItem.HEADLINE: Small Cells 2017
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This forecast provides a five-year outlook for small cells and low power RRH units. Distributed Radio Systems (DRS) are also included in the 2017-2022 market forecast.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The 2017-2022 forecast includes small cells by air interface, region, power level, frequency band, MIMO level, and other breakdowns. Market share is included for key segments including residential, enterprise, and carrier markets.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: enodeb small cell rrh femtocell microcell picocell prrh prru shipment revenue market share forecast
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: mexp-smallcells-17 rev1 ericsson.pdf, mexp-smallcells-17 rev1 ericsson.xlsx
